TopicTitle: What level engineer is required to fix Gigantor solar panel?

Articles.Content:
Broke it. Trying to fix it in orbit. Wondering what level of engineer is required to fix Gigantor solar panel, or if a level 0 is fine.

Thanks in advance.

Edited August 24, 2015 by OddFunction
I don't believe solar panels can be fixed in orbit, sorry. As far as I know it's just landing gear and rover wheels.

I don't believe solar panels can be fixed in orbit, sorry. As far as I know it's just landing gear and rover wheels.

I see. I'll just have to attach new ones then.

Thanks for the help.

Broke it. Trying to fix it in orbit. Wondering what level of engineer is required to fix Gigantor solar panel, or if a level 0 is fine.

Thanks in advance.

Dont quote me on this, but i believe gigantors are impossible to repair (as are other solar panels if they break off).

Currently i know engys can repack parachutes, fix wheels, and improve performance or IRSU and drills. While i may be wrong, the last time i tried to fix solar panels, they appears to be destroyed permanently.

Of course KIS to the rescue.

Well yes, but the problem is that you can't grab the solar panels base because it's behaving as if it's not a real part anymore. You can only strap new ones over the old ones which looks kind of ugly and is annoying.
You can always edit the save file. AFAIR "BROKEN" -> "DEPLOYED".

Engineers need to have the ability to fix solar panels as i see no reason they shouldnt be able to. Maybee let them deploy sentry guns too, but thatd be more of a suggestion to give Bahamuto for implementing in BDArmory....

Engineers need to have the ability to fix solar panels as i see no reason they shouldnt be able to.

Maybe because they broke off in atmospheric flight and blew away?

Happy landings!
Would be nice. Maybe give it to them at level 4.
But the panels fly in all directions, how would the engineer even fix it? He'd need a new set of panels anyway. KIS is the only realistic answer
I don't see the engineers carrying spare tires, but they can repair rover wheels.
